snippet.title: Official Call of Duty: Black Ops Zombies iOS Trailer
snippet.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Zombies is now available for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch! Experience Zombies on the go with a fully replicated Kino der Toten and 50 levels of the cult-favorite Dead Ops Arcade. Featuring Voice Chat for a true multiplayer experience, join up with up to three other friends as you take down hordes of the living dead. Pick it up now at the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id471063940
